comments.raw_text:
Noticed this while debugging bug 627256 -- I had a breakpoint in gdb that hit while an arrow panel (doorhanger) was showing. While the  browser was frozen in the breakpoint, I found that dragging my terminal around it was over the browser but under the arrow panel.

Might seem like an edge case, but real users could probably hit this when weird glitches cause our process to hang at the wrong time, or gets confused about what app/window is focused/foreground.
